languages.text: Вместо выживших коридоры улья полнятся еретиками — безумцы пожирают плоть себе подобных, дабы притупить ненасытный голод.

traits.locale_text: Вместо выживших коридоры Гордости Сантиэля полнятся еретиками — безумцы пожирают плоть себе подобных, дабы притупить ненасытный голод.

languages.text: Instead of survivors, the passageways of the hive city are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.
languages.original_text: Вместо выживших коридоры улья полнятся еретиками — безумцы пожирают плоть себе подобных, дабы притупить ненасытный голод.

traits.locale_text: Instead of survivors, the passageways of Santiel's Pride are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.
Instead of survivors, the passageways of Santiel's Pride are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.
Instead of survivors, the passageways of Santiel's Pride are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.
Instead of survivors, the passageways of the hive city are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.
Instead of survivors, the passageways of the hive city are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.

languages.text: 巢都的通道里并没有幸存者，而是挤满了异端分子。那些疯子吞噬着彼此的肉体，试图以此消解永远无法满足的饥饿感。
languages.original_text: Instead of survivors, the passageways of the hive city are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.

traits.locale_text: 巢都的通道里并没有幸存者，而是挤满了异端分子。那些疯子吞噬着彼此的肉体，试图以此消解永远无法满足的饥饿感。

languages.text: 多層都市の通路は生存者ではなく異端者で溢れかえっている。狂人たちは満たされることのない飢餓を紛らわすために、同族の肉をむさぼり食っている。
languages.original_text: Instead of survivors, the passageways of the hive city are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.

traits.locale_text: 多層都市の通路は生存者ではなく異端者で溢れかえっている。狂人たちは満たされることのない飢餓を紛らわすために、同族の肉をむさぼり食っている。

languages.text: En lugar de supervivientes, por los pasadizos de la ciudad colmena vagan herejes lunáticos que devoran la carne de sus aliados en un intento vano de saciar su hambre ilimitada.
languages.original_text: Instead of survivors, the passageways of the hive city are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.

traits.locale_text: En lugar de supervivientes, por los pasadizos de la colmena vagan herejes lunáticos que devoran la carne de sus aliados en un intento vano de saciar su hambre ilimitada.

languages.text: Anstelle von Überlebenden bevölkern zahllose Häretiker die Gänge der Makropole – Wahnsinnigen, die das Fleisch ihrer eigenen Leute fressen, um ihren unersättlichen Hunger zu stillen.
languages.original_text: Instead of survivors, the passageways of the hive city are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.

traits.locale_text: Anstelle von Überlebenden bevölkern zahllose Häretiker die Gänge der Makropole – Wahnsinnigen, die das Fleisch ihrer eigenen Leute fressen, um ihren unersättlichen Hunger zu stillen.

languages.text: Les couloirs de la ruche grouillent non pas de survivants, mais d'hérétiques, de fous dévorant la chair de leurs congénères pour tenter d'apaiser leur insatiable faim.
languages.original_text: Instead of survivors, the passageways of the hive city are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.

traits.locale_text: Les couloirs de la ruche grouillent non pas de survivants, mais d'hérétiques, de fous dévorant la chair de leurs congénères pour tenter d'apaiser leur insatiable faim.

languages.text: Kovan kentin girişleri; hayatta kalmış insanlarla değil, sonu gelmez açlıklarını bastırabilmek için kendi türlerinin etini yiyen deli kâfirlerle dolu.
languages.original_text: Instead of survivors, the passageways of the hive city are teeming with heretics — madmen devour the flesh of their own kind to try to dull their insatiable hunger.

traits.locale_text: Kovan şehrin girişleri hayatta kalanlarla değil, kâfirlerle, sonu gelmez açlıklarını bastırabilmek için kendi türlerinin etini yiyen delilerle kaynıyor.
